bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require collection of transportation data. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-13 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Beginning with the 2003-2004 school year, all school districts shall collect data by grade level on the number of students transported to and from school, the number of those students who reside more than five miles from the school district's primary attendance center, the number of miles each student is actually transported, and the number of buses and routes. The school districts shall report the data annually to the department in conjunction with average daily membership or financial reporting requirements as promulgated in rule, pursuant to chapter 1-26, by the department. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
